title: Print, "At Sea, - signalling a passing Steamer", 1871
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Cora E. Wilson [according to original catalogue card]
description: Horizontal view at night showing the starboard side of the fore portion of a vessel and foremast.  Four men, in nautical uniform, on bridge, and two skyrockets ascending.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "At Sea, - signalling a passing Steamer", 1871.
1871. Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper. Gift of Cora Wilson. 1939-70-2.
